activities: Innodata Synodex, LLC and its affiliates (the “Company”) provide services, products and solutions that customers use to create, manage, use and distribute digital information.  Innodata Synodex, LLC performs a range of advanced data analysis services in the, healthcare, medical and insurance areas. The Company may receive personal information in the course of providing any of the aforementioned services.  However, the Company generally receives such information for processing on behalf of customers and does not own and/or control such information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Services - (CSV)General Services - (GSV)Information Services - (INF)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)
personaldata: The Company may process personal data in manual, automated, online, offline, electronic and hard copy form.
recoursemech: The Company will utilize the alternative dispute resolution service of the American Arbitration Association (AAA) in the event that the Company is unable to internally resolve any complaints or disputes regarding its use and/or disclosure of Personal Information.
